function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Low overall correlation between variables","Impact":"Difficulty in understanding the relationships between variables and making accurate predictions","Mitigation":"Use alternative statistical methods to identify and analyze relationships, such as spatial statistical models","Technologies":"Spatial statistical models, econometric methods","People":"Data analysts, statisticians","Owner":"Data analysis team, research organization"},{"Description":"Spatial autocorrelation and spatial spillover effects","Impact":"Distorted analysis and biased results due to the influence of neighboring regions on outcomes","Mitigation":"Incorporate spatial weighting matrix and use spatial statistical models like SAR and SEM","Technologies":"Spatial statistical models, SAR, SEM","People":"Spatial analysts, statisticians","Owner":"Spatial analysis team, research organization"},{"Description":"Use of geocodes and spatial weighting matrices","Impact":"Reliance on accurate geocode data for spatial analysis and potential errors in spatial weighting matrices","Mitigation":"Ensure accuracy of geocode data and validate spatial weighting matrices","Technologies":"Geocoding tools, validation software","People":"Geospatial analysts, data scientists","Owner":"Geospatial analysis team, data management team"}]}
